text: If you would ask my mom what books I liked growing up, I liked Dr. Seuss.
author: will.i.am

text: I was born and raised in East Los Angeles by a single mom who had three biological kids and adopted four more. I never met my dad.
author: will.i.am

text: When I got into junior high school, that's when my mom let me dress how I wanted to dress. Up to that point I wore suits to school all the time.
author: will.i.am

text: I remember when I was 11, I told my mom, 'One day I'm going to buy you a house.' And she said, 'Boy, don't you be making promises you can't keep.' I was like: 'No, Ma, it's not a promise. I'm going to buy you a house one day.'
author: will.i.am

text: These days it's cool to be ethnic and to be different, but when I was a kid, it was not cool - at all. My friends would come over and my mom would make crepes with eggs, stuffed with mozzarella cheese, tomatoes and spinach. And they'd be like, 'What is this?'
author: Giada De Laurentiis
